title: Oil: Saudi sees producers extending cuts into 2019
text:
Oil: Saudi sees producers extending cuts into 2019 Friday, March 23, 2018 - 01:47 
Crude prices spike after Saudi Arabia says OPEC members will need to continue coordinating with Russia and other non-OPEC oil-producing countries on supply curbs in 2019. David Pollard reports.   
Crude prices spike after Saudi Arabia says OPEC members will need to continue coordinating with Russia and other non-OPEC oil-producing countries on supply curbs in 2019. David Pollard reports.  //reut.rs/2pyyvQY
